Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed jar, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, the exterior is covered with a self-slip and slight traces of a black-painted text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (108386) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/108386)
